languages.text: {n}Старик смущенно тупит взгляд.{/n} "Простите слуг Кетца Темера за говор их, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Как бы ни старались предки передать язык богов тем, кто остался после, племена редко его используют. Ибо боги спускаются со своих небесных чертогов не чаще, чем раз в три-человеческие-жизни".

traits.locale_text: {n}Старик смущенно тупит взгляд.{/n} "Простите слуг Кетца Темера за говор их, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Как бы ни старались предки передать язык богов тем, кто остался после, племена редко его используют. Ибо боги спускаются со своих небесных чертогов не чаще, чем раз в три-человеческие-жизни".

languages.text: {n}The old man looks down, embarrassed.{/n} "Forgive the servants of Quetza Temer for their speech, O Starborn! No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods on to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three life-dwells."
languages.original_text: {n}Старик смущенно тупит взгляд.{/n} "Простите слуг Кетца Темера за говор их, о Звездорожденн{mf|ый|ая}! Как бы ни старались предки передать язык богов тем, кто остался после, племена редко его используют. Ибо боги спускаются со своих небесных чертогов не чаще, чем раз в три-человеческие-жизни".

No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three human lifetimes."

No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three human lifetimes."

No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three human lifetimes."

No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three human lifetimes."

No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods on to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three life-dwells."

No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods on to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three life-dwells."

languages.text: {n}El anciano baja la mirada avergonzado.{/n} «¡Perdona a los siervos de Quetza Temer por su indigna forma de hablar, oh, {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas! Por mucho que se esforzaron los ancestros en inculcar el lenguaje de los dioses a sus descendentes, las tribus apenas lo utilizan, pues los dioses solamente descienden de su palacio celestial una vez por cada tres vidas».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks down, embarrassed.{/n} "Forgive the servants of Quetza Temer for their speech, O Starborn! No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods on to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three life-dwells."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano baja la mirada avergonzado.{/n} «¡Perdona a los siervos de Quetza Temer por su indigna forma de hablar, oh {mf|Hijo|Hija} de las Estrellas! Por mucho que se esforzaron los ancestros en inculcar el lenguaje de los dioses a sus descendentes, las tribus apenas lo utilizan, pues los dioses solamente descienden de su palacio celestial una vez por cada tres vidas humanas».

languages.text: {n}老人尴尬地低下头。{/n}“请原谅格扎尔特默仆人的说话方式吧，星裔！尽管祖先很努力地把神明的语言传给了他们的后人，但部落确实很少使用这种语言。因为哪怕在三个人类生命周期中，神明都未必会从他们的天宫降临到这里一次。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks down, embarrassed.{/n} "Forgive the servants of Quetza Temer for their speech, O Starborn! No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods on to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three life-dwells."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人尴尬地低下头。{/n}“请原谅格扎尔特默仆人的说话方式吧，星裔！尽管祖先很努力地把神明的语言传给了他们的后人，但部落确实很少使用这种语言。因为哪怕在三个人类生命周期中，神明都未必会从他们的天宫降临到这里一次。”

languages.text: {n}Le vieillard baisse les yeux, manifestement gêné.{/n} « Pardonnez aux serviteurs de Quetza Temer leur façon de parler, ô Stellaire ! Bien que les ancêtres aient tenté de transmettre la langue des dieux à leurs descendants, les tribus l'utilisent peu, car les dieux ne descendent de leur palais céleste qu'une fois toutes les trois existences humaines. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks down, embarrassed.{/n} "Forgive the servants of Quetza Temer for their speech, O Starborn! No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods on to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three life-dwells."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme baisse les yeux, manifestement gêné.{/n} « Pardonnez aux serviteurs de Quetza Temer leur façon de parler, ô Stellaire ! Bien que les ancêtres aient tenté de transmettre la langue des dieux à leurs descendants, les tribus l'utilisent peu, car les dieux ne descendent de leur palais céleste qu'une fois toutes les trois vies humaines. »

languages.text: {n}老人は恥ずかしそうに下を向く。{/n}「ケツァ・テメルのしもべの言葉をゆるしたまえ、スターボーンよ！父祖がどんなに神々の言葉を子孫に伝えようとしても、部族がそれを使うことはめったにない。神々が天の宮殿より降り立つのは、三度の人生に一度あるかどうかなのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks down, embarrassed.{/n} "Forgive the servants of Quetza Temer for their speech, O Starborn! No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods on to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three life-dwells."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は恥ずかしそうに下を向く。{/n}「ケツァ・テメルのしもべの言葉をゆるしたまえ、スターボーンよ！父祖がどんなに神々の言葉を子孫に伝えようとしても、部族がそれを使うことはめったにない。神々が天の宮殿より降り立つのは、3人の人間の生涯に1度あるかどうかなのだ」

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann blickt beschämt zu Boden.{/n} "Vergebt den Dienern von Quetza Temer ihre Sprechweise, o {mf|Sternengeborener|Sternengeborene}! So sehr die Ahnen auch versucht haben, die Sprache der Götter an ihre Nachfahren weiterzugeben, die Stämme nutzen sie selten. Denn die meisten Götter steigen nicht öfter als einmal in drei Leben-Kreisen von ihrem himmlischen Palast hinab."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man looks down, embarrassed.{/n} "Forgive the servants of Quetza Temer for their speech, O Starborn! No matter how much the ancestors tried to pass the language of the gods on to their descendants, the tribes seldom use it, for the gods only descend from their heavenly palace not more often than once in three life-dwells."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann blickt beschämt zu Boden.{/n} "Vergebt den Dienern von Quetza Temer ihre Sprechweise, o {mf|Sternengeborener|Sternengeborene}! So sehr die Ahnen auch versucht haben, die Sprache der Götter an ihre Nachfahren weiterzugeben, die Stämme nutzen sie selten. Denn die meisten Götter steigen nicht öfter als einmal in drei menschlichen Lebenszeiten von ihrem himmlischen Palast hinab."
